name: MilkASwitch
description:
MilkASwitch is a 3D infinite runner with a twist!

Out Now On Amazon, Google & Microsoft Store!!

Your farm is on the verge of collapse! Milk production has been your only source of income now you must work together with your animals to collect as much milk and produce  milk. 

Welcome to Project MilkASwitch! Switch between human and animal. Remember animals eat grass to produce milk, humans drink milk!

Keyboard Controls 

  • Up Arrow- Jump
  • Left Arrow - Switch

Touch Controls

Tap right - Jump

Tap left - Switch
